item.title: By: Dana Castaldo

item.description: Very helpful, thank you Dr. Waldron.

item.title: By: Robert Briggs
item.dc:creator: Robert Briggs
item.description: Glad to see your reviews on this Sam, I picked it up at the Shepherd's Conference and have been reading through it. It has not really been what I thought and seems to just be re-stating old Dispensational perspectives. Always grateful for the things I learned through your lectures and instruction.
item.content:encoded: Glad to see your reviews on this Sam, I picked it up at the Shepherd’s Conference and have been reading through it. It has not really been what I thought and seems to just be re-stating old Dispensational perspectives. Always grateful for the things I learned through your lectures and instruction.
